name: Scott Adams' Graphic Adventure #3: Secret Mission
overview: This is the enhanced version of the original all-text Scott Adams Adventure, Secret Mission. Additions to the original game include illustrations for each location, and support for the VOTRAX voice synthesizer. Otherwise the game remains essentially the same as the original. It takes place in a nuclear power plant. You must race against time to fulfill your mission or the reactor may be doomed. You use one or two word commands to move around and manipulate objects.
